channel.title: Business News on Blowfish
channel.description: Recent content in Business News on Blowfish

item.title: Top Disrupters of 2024
item.author: nuno@n9o.xyz (Blowfish)
item.description:
Top Disrupters of 2024

  1. OpenAI - The first-ever back-to-back top disruptor
  2. Anduril Industries - A future fighting force
  3. Stripe - $1 trillion in online transactions
  4. Brex - Well spent
  5. Databricks - Building, bit by bit
  6. Canva - Design star
  7. Anthropic - An Amazon-backed OpenAI threat
  8. ElevateBio - A basecamp for drug discovery
  9. Wiz - A hyper cyber grower
  10. Exotec - What’s up in the warehouse
  11. Octopus Energy - A highly intelligent grid
  12. Scale AI - AI’s personal trainer
  13. Notion - Creative collaboration
  14. Flutterwave - Fintech for fast-growing populations
  15. Relativity Space - Rocket stars
  16. Monzo - One of Britain’s biggest banks
  17. Transcarent - A friend with benefits
  18. Arctic Wolf - Cold cyber comfort
  19. Einride - Trucking’s next stop
  20. Thrive Market - An online grocer to check out
  21. Zipline - Delivering on drones’ promise
  22. Chime - Banking on more banking distrust
  23. GrubMarket - Digital transformation for America’s food supply chain
  24. Carbon Robotics - The laser-based weed killer
  25. Generate:Biomedicines - Designer AI drugs
  26. Figma - Adobe’s ex, moving on, creating new relationships
  27. Kapital - The bank that wants small business
  28. Deel - On a payroll
  29. Alto Pharmacy - Big online pharma
  30. Cohere - The gen AI inside more company firewalls
  31. Zum - Making the yellow school bus green
  32. Ramp - The corporate expense hawk
  33. Dedrone - Smart air security
  34. Lead Bank - An extreme bank makeover
  35. Phononic - Heating up, and cooling down
  36. Solugen - A sugar fix for the climate
  37. Tala - Developing credit in developing markets
  38. Navan - The corporate traveler
  39. Beewise - Busy with bee collapse
  40. AlphaSense - Wall Street’s AI search engine
  41. Trust & Will - Where there’s a will, there’s need for better estate planning
  42. Gecko Robotics - Critical mission robots
  43. Glean - A Google and a ChatGPT for the enterprise
  44. Discord - Its game is still on
  45. Spring Health - Completely mental
  46. Lineage - The largest link in the global food supply chain
  47. Abnormal Security - Looking for phishy business
  48. Watershed - The operating system for corporate climate commitments
  49. Maven Clinic - Whole-person healthcare for women and families.
  50. Cityblock - A high stakes bet on lowering the cost of Medicaid
